alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:59PM CDT until August 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR PERKINS AND WESTERN CHASE COUNTIES... At 559 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Brule to 12 miles southeast of Venango to 6 miles south of Lamar, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grant, Madrid, Venango, Lamar, Crete, Chase, Wild Horse Spring, Brandon and Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 44 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
